string.text: 5.45x39 AK-74 Magazine

A standard AK-74 magazine chambered in 5.45x39mm designed for the AK-74 rifle. It is constructed from high-strength polymer, providing reliable feeding and lightweight construction. The double-stack design offers optimal capacity but can be affected by dirt and debris. The magazine includes textured sides for improved handling. Manufactured by Izhmash in Russia.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] firearm component
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] rifle magazine
5.45x39 AK-74 Magazine

An extended AK-74 magazine chambered in 5.45x39mm. It is made from high-strength polymer, ensuring reliable feeding and lightweight construction. The extended design increases bulk, making it less suitable for maneuverability in tight spaces. Textured sides enhance handling and rapid reloading. Manufactured by Izhmash in Russia.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] firearm component
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] rifle magazine
5.45x39 AK-74M Magazine

A standard AK-74M magazine chambered in 5.45x39mm designed for the AK-74M rifle. It is constructed from durable polymer with steel reinforcements, providing reliable feeding and robust construction. The double-stack design offers optimal capacity but can be prone to dirt and debris. The magazine features ergonomic base plates for better handling. Manufactured by Kalashnikov Concern in Russia.

Fast-loading 5.45x39 AK-74M Magazine

A fast-loading AK-74M magazine chambered in 5.45x39mm. It is made from durable polymer with steel reinforcements, ensuring reliable feeding and robust construction. The fast-loading mechanism allows for quicker reloads but can be more complex to maintain. The magazine includes textured sides and ergonomic base plates for improved handling. Manufactured by Kalashnikov Concern in Russia.

5.45x39 RPK-74 Magazine

A standard RPK-74 magazine chambered in 5.45x39mm designed for the RPK-74 light machine gun. It is constructed from steel, providing reliable feeding and durability. The high-capacity design offers extended firing duration but adds significant weight. The magazine features ergonomic base plates for better handling. Manufactured by Izhmash in Russia.

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] rifle magazine
Modified 5.56x45 RPK-74 Magazine

A modified RPK-74 magazine chambered in 5.56x45mm. It is made from steel, ensuring reliable feeding and durability. The modification changes ammunition compatibility and can reduce feeding reliability. The high-capacity design adds weight and bulk, impacting maneuverability. Manufactured by Izhmash in Russia.

7.62x39 RPD Drum

A standard RPD drum magazine chambered in 7.62x39mm designed for the RPD light machine gun. It is made from steel, providing reliable feeding and robust construction. The drum design offers high capacity but adds significant weight and bulk, making it less suitable for rapid movement. The magazine features a winding mechanism for proper operation. Manufactured by various Soviet arsenals.
